column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Took a trip to this location with some friends from out of town this past weekend
column2: and I must say this is what deep dish is all about. We ordered two mediums (which is a lot of pizza for those not familar with Chicago style deep dish) . The signature "Lou" pizza with fresh spinach
column5: and cheese sounded good but was actually a bit disappointing. Still
column6: the restaurant deserves its five stars because of the pepperoni and sausage deep dish. Probably my favorite deep dish in the city (though Giordano's stuffed pie is my favorite pizza!). We went here on a Saturday night
column7: and while we did have to wait
column9: and like most Chicago pizza joints
column10: you're able to order while you wait. Highly recommended!
